name: Hero Galaxy: Artifacts
description:
Artifacts are stand-alone ERC 721 NFTs that can be equipped by Hero Galaxy Heroes or sold on the open market. 

Artifacts are earned as rewards for gameplay, heroic deeds, and by staked Heroes. Artifacts may also be minted in the Hero Galaxy Armory: https://armory.herogalaxy.io/heroes

Artifacts follow tiers and mint/drop frequencies as follows: Common (50%), Uncommon (31%), Rare (12%), Epic (5.2%), Legendary (1.6%), Cosmic (0.19%), and Galactic, (0.1%).

Check out our links to learn more: https://linktr.ee/herogalaxy
